content.text:
[@SoapDog](@gaQw6z30GpfsW9k8V5ED4pHrg8zmrqku24zTSAINhRg=.ed25519)

Thanks, I'd be super interested to hear what everyone is using. When I gave up on using the same password everywhere I started using password generators (and password managers) religiously, so I was surprised that Firefox saved but didn't generate them. It's open source so I *could* build it myself, but I'd rather have one that was maintained by a team I trust.
